title: Test model
description: This is a test model. Upon loading, you will see a test object being displayed in 3D (with WebGL), which is loaded from a database. But change any of the sliders, and another test model--consisting of a torus and cone--will be generated on-the-fly!

params.name: Holes
params.desc: Edit the number of holes in the torus

params.name: Axle diameter
params.desc: Edit the diameter of the cylinder that cuts the cone
